meanings.definition: Animals that maintain a constant body temperature regardless of external conditions.
meanings.sent1: Homoiotherms are animals that always have the same body temperature.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study homoiotherms to understand how they regulate their temperature.
meanings.sent3: The homoiotherms at the zoo never need to worry about getting too hot or too cold.
meanings.sent4: In the world of homoiotherms, a stable body temperature is like a cozy blanket on a chilly night.
meanings.sent5: The survival of homoiotherms depends on their ability to maintain a constant internal heat level.

meanings.definition: Organisms that regulate their body temperature internally.
meanings.sent1: Homoiotherms control their body temperature from within.
meanings.sent2: The ability of homoiotherms to internally adjust their temperature is fascinating.
meanings.sent3: The homoiotherms in the forest throw a party to celebrate their temperature regulation skills.
meanings.sent4: Like skilled engineers, homoiotherms fine-tune their internal temperature for optimal performance.
meanings.sent5: The secret to the success of homoiotherms lies in their internal thermostat system.

meanings.definition: Creatures that are able to keep a stable body temperature.
meanings.sent1: Homoiotherms can always maintain a stable body temperature.
meanings.sent2: The survival of homoiotherms in extreme conditions showcases their temperature stability.
meanings.sent3: The homoiotherms in the desert throw a pool party to show off their cool temperature control.
meanings.sent4: In the world of nature, homoiotherms are the masters of temperature equilibrium.
meanings.sent5: The adaptability of homoiotherms to different climates is a testament to their stable body temperature.
